sm::eod::FaceTextureOutputData

FaceTextureOutputData Class Reference

#include <facetextureoutputdata.h>

Inherits EngineOutputBase.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

FaceTextureOutputData contains an image and a transform between a FaceTextureCoordinate and a pixel.

FaceTextureOutputData is usually provided as an optional sub-object of FaceOutputData.

Note:
Do not inherit.

Definition at line 23 of file facetextureoutputdata.h.

  ORTHOGRAPHIC_PROJECTION = 0,
  UNKNOWN = -1

void addFaceTexture ( sm::eod::FaceTextureOutputData::FaceTextureType  type,
const ImageOutputDataPtr &  face_texture 
)

Adds face texture. If type == UNKNOWN, clears the texture.

Precondition:
(type==UNKNOWN && !face_texture) || (type!=UNKNOWN && face_texture)

void addMaskLandmark ( const sm::eod::FaceLandmark &  landmark  ) 

Adds a mask landmark to the FaceOutputData.

Precondition:
landmark.id is in range 800..899

bool faceMaskCoordinate ( sm::eod::FaceLandmarkId  landmark_id,
sm::eod::FaceCoordinate &  coord 
) const

Gets the face coordinate associated with landmark_id, where landmark_id is a Mask Id.

Parameters:
landmark_id integer value representing a specific location on the face. Refer to the FLM Standard for details.
coord Current position of the facial landmark in 3D coordinates with respect to the head-reference frame (meters).
Returns:
true if the landmark exists. If false, the value of coord is unchanged.

const FaceLandmarkMap& faceMaskLandmarks (  )  const

Returns:
The mapping between mask landmark-ids and landmark data. Use this for enumerating all the face-coordinates.

bool faceMaskTextureCoordinate ( sm::eod::FaceLandmarkId  landmark_id,
sm::eod::FaceTextureCoordinate &  coord 
) const

Gets the face texture coordinate associated with landmark_id, where landmark_id is a Mask Id.

Parameters:
landmark_id integer value representing a specific location on the face. Refer to the FLM Standard for details.
coord Current position of the facial landmark in face-texture coordinates. Refer to the FTC Standard for details.
Returns:
true if the landmark exists. If false, the value of coord is unchanged.

void faceTCToPixel ( const sm::eod::FaceTextureCoordinate &  coord,
float &  x_out,
float &  y_out 
) const

Convert a face-texture coordinate to a pixel.

Parameters:
coord A 2D texture coordinate obtained from the FaceOutputData, representing a location on the face texture.
x_out Pixel value x coordinate (column) in the face-texture image. May be out of bounds. Value is a float for sub-pixel accuracy.
y_out Pixel value y coordinate (row) in the face-texture image. May be out of bounds. Value is a float for sub-pixel accuracy. A FaceTextureCoordinate is a 2D normalized coordinate obtained from FaceOutputData.

ConstImageOutputDataPtr faceTexture (  )  const

Returns:
the face texture, or 0 if not attached.

FaceTextureOutputData::FaceTextureType faceTextureType (  )  const

Return the type of the face texture, or UNKNOWN if not attached.
